XXvinv15_u:103: The Buddha eulogises the order by age tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sagauravā viharata sapratīṣāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ sabrahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu; tat kasya hetoḥ? sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣur agauravo viharann apratīśaḥ abhayavaśavartī sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate; āsamudācārikān dharmān aparipūrya
XXvinv15_u:104: śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate; śaikṣān dharmān aparipūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
XXvinv15_u:105: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham aparipūryānupādāya (Śay-v 10) parinirvāsyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate; sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ sagauravo viharan
XXvinv15_u:106: sapratīśaḥ sabhayavaśavartī brahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān dharmān pūrayiṣyati (MSV III 132) sthānam etad vidyate;
XXvinv15_u:107: āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrya śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate; śaikṣān dharmān paripūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate; vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūryānupādāya parinirvāsyati sthānam etad vidyate; tasmāt tahi bhikṣava evaṃ
XXvinv15_u:108: śikṣitavyam; yat sagauravā vihariṣyāmaḥ sapratīśāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ ḥsabrahmacāriṣūḥ sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
XXvinv15_u:109: The institution of vihāras yadā bhagavatā pañcakā vinītās te araṇye prativasanti; te araṇye prativasanto āgamyā bhavanti siṃhānāṃ vyāghrāṇāṃ dvīpināṃ tarakṣūṇām bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: kutra pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakā āvāsaṃ kalpitavantaḥ? paśyati vihāre; devatābhir apy evaṃ bhagavata ārocitam tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ kalayāṇabhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ
XXvinv15_u:110: prativasati; tasya kuśalamūlapratibodhitasantater etad abhavat; aho batāhaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇaṃ vihāraṃ kārayeyam iti; sa kālyam evotthāya
XXvinv15_u:111: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ; upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau (A 317a)
XXvinv15_u:112: śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ; ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kalyāṇabhadrikaṃ gṛhapatiṃ
XXvinv15_u:113: bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati
XXvinv15_u:114: saṃpraharṣayati; anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarṣya (MSV III 133)
XXvinv15_u:115: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm; atha kalyāṇabhadriko gṛhapatir
XXvinv15_u:116: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam ieam avocat: yadi bhagavān anujānīyād ahaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ vihāraṃ karayeyam iti; bhagavān āha; tasmād gṛhapate anujānāmi
XXvinv15_u:117: kāraya iti; sa na jānīte kīdṛśaḥ kārayitavya iti; bhagavān āha: yadi trilayanaṃ kārayasi madhye gandhakuṭiḥ kārayitavyā dvayoḥ pārśvayor dve
XXvinv15_u:118: layane; evaṃ triṣāle nava layanāni; catuḥśāle madhye dvārakoṣṭhakābhimukhaṃ (Śay-v 11) gandhakuṭiḥ; dvārakoṣṭhakapārśvayor dve layane; sa na jānīte kati purāḥ kartavyā iti; bhagavān āha: bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcapurā vihārāḥ kartavyāḥ saptapurā gandhakuṭiḥ; saptapūrā
XXvinv15_u:119: bālāgrapotikāḥ; bhikṣūṇīnāṃ tu tripurā vihārāḥ kartavyāḥ; paṃcapurā
XXvinv15_u:121: The story of Anāthapiṇḍada: his birth and wonders tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ datto nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī; tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam; sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati; tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya (MSV III
XXvinv15_u:122: 134) paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā; sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā
XXvinv15_u:123: navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā; dārako jātaḥ; tasya trīṇi saptakāny
XXvinv15_u:124: ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ
XXvinv15_u:125: vyavasthāpyate; kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti; jñātaya ūcuḥ: ayaṃ dārako dattasya gṛhapateḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sudatta iti nāmeti;
XXvinv15_u:126: tasya sudatta iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam; sudatto dārako 'ṣṭābhyo
XXvinv15_u:127: dhātrībhyo dattaḥ; dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyām; dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyām;
XXvinv15_u:128: dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyām; dvābhyāṃ krīḍanakābhyām; so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṃkajam;
XXvinv15_u:131: prayaccha me alaṃkāram iti; tena pramuditamanasā asāv alaṃkāro dattaḥ; sa gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ; pitrā cāsya dhātrī pṛṣṭā; kutra kumārasyālaṃkāra iti; sā
XXvinv15_u:133: vibhūṣitaḥ; so 'pi dattaḥ; bhūyo 'py alaṃkṛtaḥ; so 'pi tena dattaḥ; sa gṛhapatiḥ patnīm āmantrayate: bhadre sobhano 'smākaṃ putro jātaḥ; nityaṃ dānābhirata iti; sā kathayati: āryaputra yady evaṃ nainaṃ bhūyo 'py
XXvinv15_u:134: alaṃkariṣyāmi; sa kathayati: bhadre asty asmākaṃ suvarṇam aprameyaṃ ratnāni ca; kin tu alaṃkāraghaṭakā na santi; sarvathā nāyaṃ bahir (A 317b)
XXvinv15_u:135: niṣkāsayitavya iti; so 'bhyantara eva lāḍyate; yāvad apareṇa samayena
XXvinv15_u:136: datto gṛhapatir bhṛtyajanaparivṛto (MSV III 135) nadīm ajīravatīṃ snātuṃ
XXvinv15_u:137: saṃprasthitaḥ; sudatto dārakaḥ kathayati: tāta aham api gacchāmīti; sa taṃ vipralambhayitum ārabdhaḥ; putra ihaiva śobhanaṃ salilam; nadī grāhākulā;
XXvinv15_u:138: iyaṃ te dhātrī snāpayiṣyatīti; sa rodituṃ pravṛttaḥ; mātāsya kathayati:
XXvinv15_u:139: āryaputra kimartham ayaṃ dārako rautīti; tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātam; sā
XXvinv15_u:140: kathayati: āryaputra tvayā sārdhaṃ gacchatu; ko 'tra virodhaḥ; sutarāṃ gupto bhaviṣyatīti; sa tam ādāya nadīṃ gataḥ; snāpayitvā kule sthāpitaḥ
XXvinv15_u:141: kathayati: tāta kimarthaṃ mama rakṣā kriyate? putra tava doṣo 'sti;
XXvinv15_u:142: katham? dattam alaṃkāraṃ yācanakebhyo 'nuprayacchasi; kiṃ tāto dravyeṇārthī? putra ko 'nārthī? tāta yady evam avatāraya mām; sa
XXvinv15_u:143: tenāvatāritaḥ; tatas tenobhau pāṇī nadyām āplāvya suvarṇapūrṇās catvāro lohasaṃghāṭā uddhṛtāḥ; kathayati: tāta atas tnaṃ yāvadāptaḥṃḥ dhanena dhanakāryaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭam atraiva plāvaya; putra kiṃ tvaṃ jalagatān nidhīn paśyasi? tāta na kevalaṃ jalagatān sthalagatān api sasvāmikān asvāmikān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike; datto gṛhapatir vismayotphullalocanaḥ
XXvinv15_u:144: saṃlakṣayati: śakyam evaṃvidhena dānaptinā dānaṃ dātum iti viditvā
XXvinv15_u:145: kathayati: putra yady evaṃ dehi dānaṃ yatheṣṭam iti; dharmatā hy eṣā: na tāvat putro yaśasvī bhavati yāvad asya pitā jīvatīti
XXvinv15_u:146: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ; sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvṛttaḥ; satatam anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchatīti samantāc chadbo
XXvinv15_u:147: visṛtaḥ: dattasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvrṭtaḥ; (Śay-v 13)
XXvinv15_u:149: gṛhapatir iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā; tatas tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānitaṃ;
XXvinv15_u:150: sa tayā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati; tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya
XXvinv15_u:151: paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ; evaṃ yāvat sapta putrā jātāḥ; tena ṣaṇṇāṃ niveśaḥ kṛtaḥ; saptamaḥ sujāto nāmnā; tasya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ samanveṣate; na
XXvinv15_u:152: ārāgayati; sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāpro vyavasthitaḥ; tasya madhuskandho nāma mānavo vayasyaḥ; tenāsau dṛṣṭas tathā cintāparaḥ; sa kathayati:
XXvinv15_u:153: kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti; sa
XXvinv15_u:154: kathayati: mayā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ niveśaḥ kṛtaḥ; saptamasya sujātasya sadṛśakulaṃ cintayāmi katarat tat kulaṃ yato 'sya niveṣaṃ kariṣyāmīti; sa
XXvinv15_u:155: kathayati: alpotsukas tiṣṭha aham asya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ gaveṣayāmi;
XXvinv15_u:156: katarasmin deśe? sa kathayati; magadhaviṣayaṃ tāvad gacchami; evaṃ kuru;
XXvinv15_u:157: sa rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ; rājagṛhe anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo
XXvinv15_u:158: 'nāthapiṇḍadasya pratirūpaḥ; sa tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo dvāraśālāyāṃ sthitvā
XXvinv15_u:159: kathayati: svasti svastīti; tasya gṛhajanāḥ kathayanti: brāhmaṇa kiṃ prārthayasi? kanyābhikṣām; kasyārthāya? śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis
XXvinv15_u:160: tasya putraḥ sujāto nāmnā; te kathayanti sādṛṣo 'smākaṃ kulena; api tu prabhūtam asmākaṃ kulaśulkam; (A 318a) kiyatprabhūtam? śatam aśvānāṃ śataṃ
XXvinv15_u:161: niṣkāṇāṃ śatam aśvatarīrathānāṃ śataṃ kāmbojikānāṃ kanyānām iti;
XXvinv15_u:163: lekho dattaḥ: tenāpi vācayitvā pratīccha sarvaṃ mayā deyam iti; tena divasamuhūrtayogena pratīṣṭam
XXvinv15_u:164: tatas taiḥ śucinā praṇītena prabhūtenāhāreṇa saṃtarpito mānavakaḥ śālāṃ gatvā vāsam upagato viṣūcitaḥ; aparicitā brāhmaṇāḥ; sa tair aśucibhayād bahir niṣkāsayitvā cchoritaḥ; daivād āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau taṃ pradeśam āgatau; sa tābhyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ; tatas tābhyāṃ vaṃśavidalikayā nirlikhya pāṇḍumṛttikayā udvartya snāpitaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:165: tasyaiva dharmaṃ deśayitvā prakrāntau; tasya pravāhikā nāvatiṣṭhate; sa tayor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ; cāturmahārājikeṣu
XXvinv15_u:166: deveṣūpapannaḥ; sa vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhavanaṃ
XXvinv15_u:167: prārthayate; sa kathayati: gaccha tad eva te śivikādvāraṃ bhavanam iti; sa tatra gatvā naivāsikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ (Śay-v 14)
XXvinv15_u:168: videharājena rājño biṃbisārasya haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ sātam
XXvinv15_u:169: anupreṣitam; tena rājñā prasenajitaḥ kosalasya sandiṣṭam: mama videharājena haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ śatam anupreṣitam; yady arthī bhavasi
XXvinv15_u:170: preṣya iti anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kosalas
XXvinv15_u:171: tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ; upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalam idam avocat:
XXvinv15_u:172: deva mama rājagṛhe kiṃcit prayojanam; tatra gatvā āgamiṣyāmīti; rājā
XXvinv15_u:173: kathayati: śobhanaṃ gaccha mamāpi tasmāt hastiśatam āneyaṃ (MSV III 138)
XXvinv15_u:174: tad aneṣyasīti; sa kathayati: deva yadi mama tatra prayojanaṃ ḥnaḥ bhavati
XXvinv15_u:175: grahīṣyāmīti; ihāgamya devasya cttagrāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti; rājā kathayati:
XXvinv15_u:177: Anāthapiṇḍada meets the Buddha tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ; sa yasya gṛhapater gṛhe vāsam upagataḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram
XXvinv15_u:178: evotthāyāntarjanam āmaṃtrayate: uttiṣṭhāryā uttiṣṭha; bhadramukhāḥ kāṣṭhāni pāṭayata samitiṃ prajvālayata; bhaktaṃ pacata; sūpikaṃ pacata;
XXvinv15_u:179: khādyakāny ullāḍayata; pratijāgṛta maṇḍalavāṭam iti; athānāthapiṇḍasya gṛhapater etad abhavat: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā vivāho vā bhaviṣyati; rāṣṭraṃ vānena bhaktenopanimantritam? śreṇī vā, pūgo vā parṣado vā? rājā vānena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:180: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā
XXvinv15_u:181: bhaviṣyati, vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā tvayā bhaktenopanimantritaṃ śreṇī vā pūgo
XXvinv15_u:182: vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantrita
XXvinv15_u:183: iti; sa kathayati: gṛhapate na me āvāho bhaviṣyati na vivāho vā nāpi mayā rāṣṭraṃ bhaktenopanimantritaṃ, na śreṇī na pūgo na parṣado nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantritaḥ api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita; iti anāthapaiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny (A 318b) āhṛṣṭāni; sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat: ka eṣa gṛhapate buddho nāma?
XXvinv15_u:184: asti gṛhapate śramaṇo (Śay-v 15) gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ (MSV III 139)
XXvinv15_u:185: śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ; so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
XXvinv15_u:186: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ; sa eṣa gṛhapate buddho nāma; ka eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma?
XXvinv15_u:187: santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇy vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ; brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keāśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya
XXvinv15_u:188: samyag eva śraddhayā anāgārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam
XXvinv15_u:189: anupravrajitāḥ; sa eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma; ḥśvaḥḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ; kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati? asminn eva rājagṛhe śītavane śmaśāne; labhyaṃ gṛhapate so
XXvinv15_u:190: 'smābhir bhagavān draṣṭum? tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam; sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tāṃ
XXvinv15_u:191: rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ; so 'prabhāte
XXvinv15_u:192: prabhātasaṃjñī yena śivakadvāraṃ tenopsaṅkrāntaḥ; tena khalu samayena
XXvinv15_u:193: śivakadvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati; pūrvakaṃ paścimakaṃ ca,
XXvinv15_u:194: māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighno bhaviṣyatīti; yāvat paśyati śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtam ālokena ca sphuṭam; tasyaitad adhavat: nūnaṃ prabhātā rajanī: tathā hi śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati; iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ; samanantaraniṣkrāntasya cāsya ya
XXvinv15_u:195: ālokaḥ (MSV III 140) so 'ntarhitaḥ; andhakāraṃ prādurbhūtam; tasyābhūd
XXvinv15_u:196: bhayam; abhūc chambhitatvaṃ; abhūd romaharṣah; māhaiva kaścid viheṭayen
XXvinv15_u:197: manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptam vā syāt prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam
XXvinv15_u:198: iti; viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti, namaskaroti ca; atha madhuskandhasya devaputrasya etad
XXvinv15_u:200: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatānamaskāraṃ kariṣyati; iti viditvā yāvacca śivakadvāraṃ yavac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād
XXvinv15_u:201: udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat: abhikrama
XXvinv15_u:202: gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhaviṣyati; na
XXvinv15_u:204: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam aśvatarīrathāḥ /
XXvinv15_u:207: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrāma; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati, na
XXvinv15_u:212: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas (MSV III 141) te śreyo bhavati; na pratikramataḥ; tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXvinv15_u:216: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrāma; abhikrāmatas te śreyo bhavati; na
XXvinv15_u:217: pratikrāmataḥ; (A 319a) athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam avocat: kas tvam bhadrmukha? aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:218: tavaiva purāṇo gṛhasakhā; so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
XXvinv15_u:219: asminn eva śivikādvāre naivāsikaḥ; tasmād aham evaṃ vadāmi: abhikrāma gṛhapate mā pratikrāma; abhikrāmatas te śreyo bhavati, na pratikrāmata iti; athānāthapiṇḍādasya gṛhapater etad abhavat: nāvaro buddho bhaviṣyati,
XXvinv15_u:220: nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānaṃ, yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya
XXvinv15_u:221: bhagavato darśanāya; iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:222: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrameṇa
XXvinv15_u:223: caṅkramyate, yadbhūyasā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim āgamayamānaḥ; adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantam durād eva; dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramya bhagavantam gṛhapatiḥ
XXvinv15_u:224: pratisaṃmodanayā pratisammodate: (MSV III 142) kaccid bhagavān sukhaṃ
XXvinv15_u:225: śāyita iti; atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
XXvinv15_u:226: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXvinv15_u:228: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
XXvinv15_u:231: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhpatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā
XXvinv15_u:232: ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ; ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati,
XXvinv15_u:233: saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā, tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati; yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum, tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry
XXvinv15_u:234: āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati; athānāthapiṇḍado gḥapatis tasminn
XXvinv15_u:235: evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvaṛy āryasatyāny abhisameti; tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo
XXvinv15_u:236: nirodho mārgaḥ; tasyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge
XXvinv15_u:237: prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti, evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis
XXvinv15_u:238: tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti; tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti; athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā
XXvinv15_u:239: prāptadharmā viditadharmā (MSV III 143) paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu
XXvinv15_u:240: vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā, yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjalim praṇamya bhagavantam idam (A 319b) avocat; abhikrānto 'haṃ
XXvinv15_u:241: bhadantābhikrāntaḥ; eso 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi; dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca; upāsakam māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam; atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam āvocat: kinnāmā tvaṃ gṛhapate? aham asmi bhadanta sudatto nāmnā; api tv anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchāmi; tato mām anāthapiṇṣado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte; kutobhūmakas tvaṃ gṛhapate?
XXvinv15_u:242: (Śay-v 18) asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ
XXvinv15_u:244: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī āgacchatu bhagavān śrāvastīm; ahaṃ bhagavantam
XXvinv15_u:246: bhikṣusaṅghena; santi gṛhapate vihārāḥ śrāvastyām? no bhadanta: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ
XXvinv15_u:247: manyante; āgacchatu bhagavān; ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā
XXvinv15_u:248: bhaviṣyanti; bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
XXvinv15_u:250: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ; tato 'sya
XXvinv15_u:251: yad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya (MSV III
XXvinv15_u:252: 144) punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau
XXvinv15_u:253: śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ; ekāntaninṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantam idam avocat: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṃ sahāyakan yena
XXvinv15_u:254: sahāyakena śrāvastyāṃ bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmīti; bhagavān
XXvinv15_u:255: saṃlakṣayati; katarasya bhikṣor anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro śrāvastīnivāsī ca janakāyo vidheyaḥ? paśyati śāriputrasya bhikṣoḥ; tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāriputram āmantrayate: samanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ śrāvastīnivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam iti;
XXvinv15_u:256: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena; athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt ptakrāntaḥ
XXvinv15_u:257: Śāriputra leaves for Śrāvastī athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputras tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
XXvinv15_u:258: pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat; rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
XXvinv15_u:259: kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamayya, samādāya pātracīvaraṃ, yena śrāvastī tena
XXvinv15_u:260: cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ; athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ; sa praviśann eva śrāvastīm ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānam upavanenopavanaṃ caṅkramam anucaṅkramyamāṇo
XXvinv15_u:261: suvicarann evam āha: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre (Śay-v 19) nātyāsanne divā alpākīrṇo 'lpavilāpo rātrāv alpaśabdo 'lpanirghoṣaḥ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśaḥ, yatrāhaṃ bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayiṣyāmīti; adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ,
XXvinv15_u:262: jetasya kumarasyārāmam śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīṇam alpavilāpaṃ rātrāv alpaśabdṃ alpanirghoṣaṃ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasparśam; dṛṣṭvā ca punar asyaitad abhavat:
XXvinv15_u:263: atrāhaṃ bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayiṣyāmīti; sa praviśann eva svaṃ niveśanaṃ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramya jetaṃ kumāram
XXvinv15_u:264: idam avocat; anuprayaccha me kumāra ārāmam; ahaṃ tatra bhagavato 'rthāya
XXvinv15_u:265: vihāraṃ kārayāmi iti; sa kathayati; na me gṛhapate sa ārāmaḥ; kin tu udyānaṃ tan mameti; dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat: anuprayaccha me kumāra ārāmam; ahaṃ tatra bhagavato
XXvinv15_u:266: 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayāmīti; aparityakto ḥgṛhapateḥ me ārāmāḥ
XXvinv15_u:267: koṭisaṃstareṇāpi; punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir jetaṃ kumaram idam
XXvinv15_u:268: avocat: kṛtārgho 'si kumāra ārāmasya; pratīccha hiraṇyasuvarṇam;
XXvinv15_u:269: mamārāmaḥ; kaḥ kṛtārghaḥ? tvaṃ kṛtārghaḥ; tau kṛtārgho na kṛtargha iti vivādam āpannau, yena vyāvahārikapuruṣās tena saṃprasthitāḥ; atrāntare caturṇāṃ lokapālānām etad abhavat; ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir udyukto bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ vihāraṃ māpayitum; sāhāyyam asyānuṣṭheyam iti;
XXvinv15_u:270: tato vyāvahārikapuruṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya arthādhikaraṇe niṣaṇṇāḥ;
XXvinv15_u:271: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaś ca kumāro vyāvahārikasakāśam upasaṅkrāntau;
XXvinv15_u:272: athānāthapiṇḍako gṛhapatir vyāvahārikapuruṣāṇām etam arthaṃ vistareṇa
XXvinv15_u:273: nivedayati; te kathayanti; kṛtārgho 'si kumāra ārāmasya; pratīccha
XXvinv15_u:274: suvarṇam: gṛhapatre ārāma iti; sa tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śakaṭair bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakair uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ
XXvinv15_u:275: prabhūtaṃ suvarṇam abhinirhṛtya, sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃstartum ārabdhaḥ; na
XXvinv15_u:276: parisamāpyate; tiṣṭhate evānāstīrṇaḥ kaścit pṛthivīpradeśaḥ; tataḥ anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir etam arthaṃ cintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm asthāt;
XXvinv15_u:277: katarat tan nidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati? nātistokaṃ, nātiprabhūtaṃ yena ayam
XXvinv15_u:278: anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati; na ca punar gopayitavyo
XXvinv15_u:279: bhaviṣyatīti; jetaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati; nūnam anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater
XXvinv15_u:280: vipratisāraḥ; kasmād ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajāmi; iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam (Śay-v 20) avocat;
XXvinv15_u:281: sacet te ha gṛhapate vipratisāraḥ pratīccha suvarṇam; mamaivārāmaḥ; na me kumāra vipratisāraḥ; api tv aham etam evārtham anucintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; katarat tan nidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati? nātistokaṃ nātiprabhūtaṃ,
XXvinv15_u:282: yenāyam anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati; na ca punar gopayitavyo
XXvinv15_u:283: bhaviṣyatīti; atha jetasya kumārasya etad abhavat: na batāvaro buddho
XXvinv15_u:284: bhaviṣyati; nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānam; yatredānīm ayaṃ gṛhapatir ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajati; iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ
XXvinv15_u:285: gṛhapatim idam avocat: anuprayaccha me gṛhapate anāstīrṇaṃ
XXvinv15_u:287: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumārasya anāstīrṇaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam
XXvinv15_u:288: anuprayacchati; yatra jetaḥ kumāro bhagavato 'rthāya dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ māpayati
XXvinv15_u:289: Obstruction by Tīrthyas athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum ārabdha iti tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasas tīrthyās te saṃbhūya
XXvinv15_u:290: yenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ; upasaṃkramya kathayanti: mā tvaṃ gṛhapate śramaṇasya gautamasya arthāyātra vihāraṃ kāraya; kiṃ
XXvinv15_u:291: kāraṇam? asmābhir nagarāṇi bhājitāni; śramaṇasya gautamasya rājagṛham;
XXvinv15_u:292: asmākaṃ śrāvastī; sa kathayati: bhājitāni yuṣmābhir nagarāṇi, na tu madīyam svāpateyam; yasyābhipretaṃ tasya dharmaskandhaṃ kārayāmīti; te rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ; tatrāpy anāthapiṇḍadena parājitāḥ; dhvāṅkṣās tīrthyā avikṛtavadanāḥ kathayanti; gṛhapate na te kāmakāram anuprayacchāmaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:293: śramaṇasya gautamasyāgraśrāvakaḥ āgataḥ; sa yady asmān vādena parājayate,
XXvinv15_u:294: kāraya vihāram iti; sa kathayati: śobhanam; āryaśāriputraṃ tāvad avalokayāmīti; athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yenāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ
XXvinv15_u:295: tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ; ekantaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocat; tīrthyā bhadanta śāriputra evam āhuḥ; gṛhapate na te kāmakāram anuprayacchāmaḥ; śramaṇasya gautamasya agraśrāvaka āgataḥ; sa yady asmān vādena parājayate, kāraya vihāram iti; katham atra pratipattavyam iti; āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati; kim eṣāṃ santi
XXvinv15_u:296: kānicit kuśalamūlāni uta na santīti; paśyati, santi; kasyāntike
XXvinv15_u:297: pratibaddhāni; mamaiva; punaḥ saṃlakṣayati; kim etāvanta eva mama pratibaddhā vineyā āhosvid anye 'pi vādena vineyāḥ santīti; paśyati,
XXvinv15_u:299: iti; samanvāhṛtya kathayati: gṛhapate enaṃ bhavatu; kiṃ tu saptame divase;
XXvinv15_u:300: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prītiprāmodyajāto yena tīrthyās tena upasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramya tīrthyān idam avocat; bhadanta āryaśāriputraḥ kathatyati: śobhanam, evaṃ bhavatu; kiṃ tu saptame divase iti; te
XXvinv15_u:301: saṃlakṣayanti; dvābhyām atra kāraṇābhyām bhavitavyam; athavāsau
XXvinv15_u:302: niṣpalāyitukāmaḥ; athavā pakṣaṃ samanveṣṭukāmaḥ; kim atra prāptakālam;
XXvinv15_u:303: vayam api pakṣaṃ samanveṣāmaha iti; te pakṣaṃ samanveṣṭum ārabdhāḥ; taiḥ pakṣam samanveṣamānai raktākṣo nāma parivrājako dṛṣṭaḥ; sa tair uktaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:305: vādenāhūtaḥ; sa pakṣaṃ samanveṣate; tvam asmākaṃ sāhāyyaṃ kalpaya; kiyatā
XXvinv15_u:306: kālena? itaḥ saptame divase; śobhanam, evaṃ bhavatu; yadā yuṣmākaṃ sannipato bhavati tadā mamārocayitavyam; tīrthyāḥ śaṅkitodvignamanaso divasānudivasaṃ pakṣaṃ samanveṣayante; divasāṃś ca gaṇayanti
XXvinv15_u:307: Tīrthyas and Śāriputra contest yāvat saptame divase anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā; āyuṣmataś ca śāriputrasyārthāya
XXvinv15_u:309: śrāvastīnivāsī janakāyaḥ anekāni ca tatsāmatanivāsīni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi,
XXvinv15_u:310: kānicit kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kūśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni;

XXvinv15_u:399: catūratnamayaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ kāritam; tathā saṃgītakārair api sthaviraiḥ sūtra upanibaddham bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane
XXvinv15_u:401: Previous births of Anāthapiṇḍada at the time of the seven Buddhas bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kutra bhadantānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatināyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātitapūrvaḥ? iti; bhagavān āha;
XXvinv15_u:402: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavate kalpe vipāśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān; ḥsaḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣuasahasraparivṛtaḥ imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ; tena khalu samayenāsyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ tiṣyo nāma
XXvinv15_u:405: tasyaivāntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sāksātkṛtam; tiṣyasya gṛhapater bhāgineyaḥ tatsaṃparkād vipaśyini tathāgate 'tyartham
XXvinv15_u:407: keśanakhastūpaḥ kāritah; sa saṃlakṣayati: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāham etaṃ rātrau divā cānāvṛtaṃ pāśyeyam iti tasyāntevasinā samudratīrasthenāvabhāsātmakaṃ maṇiratnaṃ prāvṛtam anupreṣitam; tenāsau tasmin caitye samāropitaṃ; tadanubhāvād asau taṃ keśanakhastūpaṃ divā rātrau cānāvṛtaṃ paśyati; tataḥ prasādajātena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo mama mātulena kumārasyāntikāt krītvā hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ; evam aham imam pṛthivīpradeśaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātayeyam; yaś ca teṣām apaścimaka tasyāham antike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām iti
XXvinv15_u:408: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau tasya gṛhapater (A 324a) bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena
XXvinv15_u:409: tato 'rvāg ekatriṃśatime kalpe śikhī nāma sāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad huddho bhagavān; ḥsaḥ ṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāra imaṃ
XXvinv15_u:410: pradeśam anuprāptaḥ; tena kyalu punaḥ samayena puṣyo nāma gṛhaptir abhūt;
XXvinv15_u:411: tenāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhatṛtīyān kośān maṇibhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya śikhinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ; syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣyo nāma grhapatir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam, api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena tato 'rvak tasminn evaikatriṃśatime kalpe viśvabhuṅ nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān; sa ṣāṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ; tena khalu samayena māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
XXvinv15_u:412: tenāyaṃ pradeśo dvau krośau muktikābhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya viśvabhujaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ; syāt khalu yuṣmākan bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ (Śay-v 29) sa tena kālena tena samayena māghur
XXvinv15_u:413: māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena tato 'rvāg asmin bhadrake kalpe krakutsundo nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān; sa catvāriṃśadbhikṣusahasraparivāra imam
XXvinv15_u:414: pradeśam anuprāptaḥ; tena khalu samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
XXvinv15_u:415: tenāpy ayaṃ prādeśo gobhiḥ pūrayitvā kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya krakutsundasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśravakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ; syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bhavadatto
XXvinv15_u:416: nāma gṛthapatir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam, api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe triṃṣadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
XXvinv15_u:417: kanakamunir nāma śāstā loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān; sa triṃśadbhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ; tena khalu samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūt; tenāpy ayaṃ pradeśaḥ paṭṭair āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya niṣkrīya kanakamuneḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ; syāt khalu ḥyuṣmākaṃḥ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam; api tv esa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ
XXvinv15_u:418: kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān:
XXvinv15_u:419: sa viṃśatisahasraparivāraḥ imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ; tena khalu samayena
XXvinv15_u:420: āṣāḍho nāma gṛhapatir abhūt; tenāpy ayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhakroṣaṃ sauvarṇair yāvair āstīrya (A 324b) kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya kāśyapasya

XXvinv15_u:422: bhikṣavo anyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena āṣāḍho nāma gṛhapatir ahbūd iti: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam, api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena (Śay-v etarhy apy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstā loka utpannas tathāgato 'rhan
XXvinv15_u:423: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyaśarathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān; aham apy ardhatrayodaśaśataprivāra imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ; etarhy apy anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ṣoḍaśalāṅgalāvaktākoṭai saṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya mama saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ
XXvinv15_u:424: bhaviṣyati bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'py aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma śāstā ṣaṇṇavatyarhatkoṭīsahasraparivāra imaṃ pradeśam
XXvinv15_u:425: āgamiṣyati; tena khalu samayena sudhano nāma gṛhapatir udbhaviṣyati; so
XXvinv15_u:426: 'pīmaṃ pradeśaṃ trīṇi yojanāni hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya maitreyasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātayiṣyati; tasyaiva śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati; syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ
XXvinv15_u:427: bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sudhano nāma gṛhaptir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam, api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sudhano nāma grhapatir udbhaviṣyati Anāthapiṇḍada has the power to see absconded treasures, no matter whether

XXvinv15_u:432: tasyām eva parṣadi saṃnisaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ; sa kathayati: alpotsukā yūyaṃ bhavanto bhavantu; ahaṃ vicārya bhavatām kathayiṣyāmi yena lakṣaṇena

XXvinv15_u:434: so 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateś cāravihārānveṣatatparaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho yāvad apareṇa samayenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nadyām ajiravatyāṃ snātvā uttīrṇaḥ; tasya tena pṛṣṭhena talaprahāro dattaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:435: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ paśyann eva tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; sa kathayati: (A
XXvinv15_u:436: 325a) vijñāto 'si gṛhapate kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ tvam yena nidhīn paśyasi sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi

XXvinv15_u:438: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ yena nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān
XXvinv15_u:439: āha; tīrthyakoṭiśatasahasreṇāpi bhikṣavo na sukaram ājñātuṃ yena lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati api tu ratnacitrāntakośo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir hiraṇyeśvaraś ca yena nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi
XXvinv15_u:440: dūre ye 'py antike bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
XXvinv15_u:441: papracchuḥ: kiṃ bhadānta anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntakośo hiranyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ? bhagavān

XXvinv15_u:444: avaśyabhāvīni; anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko
XXvinv15_u:445: 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati; na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtany upacitāni bāhye
XXvinv15_u:446: pṛthivīdhātau ḥvipacyanteḥ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātāv api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXvinv15_u:447: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /

XXvinv15_u:449: The story of the Pratyekabuddha (concerning a previous life of
XXvinv15_u:451: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālapratigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī; sa saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvajīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe
XXvinv15_u:452: sāntarjanena udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ; asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā
XXvinv15_u:453: lokasya; yāvad anyataro pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs taṃ
XXvinv15_u:454: karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ; sa tasmin udyāne 'nyatarasmin pradeśe sthitaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:455: udyānapālena puruṣeṇa tasya gṛhapater niveditam; athāmuṣmin pradeśe śāntātmā pravrajito 'vatiṣṭhate iti; tasya śrutvā saumanasyam utpannam;
XXvinv15_u:456: bhāgy ahaṃ yasya me udyāne tādṛśaḥ pravrajito 'vasthitaḥ iti prasādajātas taddarśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ; sa mahātmā nirupadhiśeṣam nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśya parinirvṛtaḥ; tatas tena gṛhapatinā
XXvinv15_u:458: 325a) citā kṣīreṇa nirvāpitā; tāny asthīni sphaṭikamaye kumbhe ratnair vyāmiśrya prakṣiptāni; tāny antaḥsthāny avabhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti;
XXvinv15_u:459: tatas tena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam; yathā tasyāsthīni ratnamiśrāṇy atyarthaṃ bhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti evam evāham anena
XXvinv15_u:460: kuśalamūlena ratnacitrāntakośaḥ syāṃ hiraṇyeśvaraś ca iti kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau gṛhapatiḥ tena kālena tena samayena eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ; yad anena pratyekabuddhe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yac ca tiṣyasya gṛhapates bhāgineyena satā vipaśyinaḥ
XXvinv15_u:461: samyaksaṃbuddhasya keśanakhastūpe avabhāsātmake maṇir āropitaḥ tasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntrakośo hiraṇyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ; iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ ekāntaśuklānām
XXvinv15_u:462: ekāntaśuklo vyatimiśrāṇām vyatimiśraḥ; tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyam yat (Śay-v 33) kṛṣṇāṇi karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ
XXvinv15_u:463: śikṣitāvyam antaroddānam tiṣyaḥ puṣyaś ca māghuś ca bhavadatto bṛhaspatiḥ /

XXvinv15_u:465: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca maṇimuktā tṛtīyakam /

XXvinv15_u:467: Disciplinary prescriptions yadānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā koṭīsaṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasya sakāśān niṣkrīya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaṃ tadā nānādeśanivāsinaḥ śrāddhāś caityābhivandakā śrāvastīṃ gacchanti; teṣāṃ kecid abhiprasannāḥ kathayanti: ārya vayam apy āryasaṃghāya jetavane kiṃcid vastu kārayema –für kārayāma?– iti; bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti: mūlyena bhūmiṃ krītvā kārayata; ārya kiyatā mūlyena dīyate iti; iyatā hiraṇyena;
XXvinv15_u:468: ārya kuto 'smākam etāvad bhavati; tathāpi tu yady etasmin pradeśe labhāmahe kārayāma iti
XXvinv15_u:469: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:
XXvinv15_u:470: gṛhapatir avalokayitavyaḥ; yady anujānīte kārayitavyam iti; bhikṣubhir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir avalokitaḥ; sa kathayati; māmāgamya śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃghasyārthāya puṇyakriyāvastu kurvanti anujānāmi;
XXvinv15_u:471: pudgalasya kurvanti nānujānāmi iti etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha; tasmād anujānāmi saṃghasyārthāya kārayitavyam; pudgalasyārthāya dānapatir avalokayitavyaḥ; yady anujānīte kārayitavyam; nānujānīte, na kārayitavyam iti āgantukā bhikṣavaḥ caityavandakā śrāvastīm āgatāḥ; te yathāsaṃstutikayā bhikṣūṇāṃ sakāśe 'vatīrṇāḥ; anyeṣāṃ saṃstutikā (Śay-v
XXvinv15_u:472: 34) na santi te vihanyante; asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: āgantukānām arthāya anuddiṣṭaṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti; anyatamasmin karvaṭake vihāraḥ; tatra bhikṣavo (A 326a) varṣā upagataḥ; yāvat tasmin karvaṭake
XXvinv15_u:473: 'ntarvarṣe bhayam utpannam; tannivāsino bhikṣavaḥ saṃtrastā apravāritāḥ santaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ; te bhikṣubhiḥ pratiśrāmitāḥ mārgaśrame prativinodite kathayanti: āyuṣmantaḥ śayanāsanam uddiśatha iti; te
XXvinv15_u:474: 'ntarvarṣam iti kṛtvā noddiśanti; āgantukā bhikṣava avadhyāyanti kṣipanti
XXvinv15_u:475: vivācayanti; katham idānīṃ yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthitasya eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayatha; yady asti vo kaukṛtyaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā prayacchata
XXvinv15_u:476: śayanāsanam iti; tathāpi te noddiśanti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata
XXvinv15_u:477: ārocayanti; asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: tasmād anujānāmi bhaṅgikabhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti;
XXvinv15_u:478: bhikṣavo na jānate: kathaṃ kartavyā iti; bhagavān āha: traimāsikī pravāraṇā kartavyā śrāvaṇamāse tu dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti;
XXvinv15_u:479: uktaṃ bhagavatā: bhaṅgibhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti yāvad apare 'pi bhaṅgibhagnakā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha: bhaṅgibhagnakān mayā bhikṣavo bhikṣūn āgamya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā prajñaptā, na tṛtīyā;
XXvinv15_u:480: bhaṅgibhagnakās tu bhikṣavaḥ yathāsaṃstutikayā viśrāmayitavyāḥ; bhikṣavaḥ tān karmādānaṃ kārayanti; bhagavān āha: na te karmādānaṃ kārayitavyāḥ iti;
XXvinv15_u:481: bhikṣavas teṣāṃ lābham anuprayacchanti; bhagavān āha: na teṣāṃ lābho
XXvinv15_u:482: deyah; bhikṣava āmiṣalābham api nānuprayacchanti; bhagavān āha:
XXvinv15_u:483: āmiṣalābhas teṣāṃ no tu vastralābha iti (Śay-v 35)
XXvinv15_u:484: ṣrāddhaiḥ prabhūtā vihārāḥ kāritāḥ; śrāvastyām alpā bhikṣava varṣā
XXvinv15_u:485: upagatāḥ; te śūnyakās tiṣṭhanti; dānapatīnāṃ paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ na
XXvinv15_u:486: bhavati; vātaputraiś cāvāsyante; bhagavāṇ āha: sarve uddeṣṭavyāḥ pratyekam
XXvinv15_u:487: ekaikasya dvau trayaś catvāro vā yathāpramāṇataḥ sarve paribhoktavyāḥ,
XXvinv15_u:488: kvacit pūrvāhṇe sthātavyam, kvacin madhyāhne, kvacid aparāhṇe, kvacid rātrau vastavyam iti; bhikṣavas te punaḥ karma na kurvanti pralubhyante;
XXvinv15_u:489: bhagavān āha: dānapatir utsāhayitavyaḥ; sa vai saṃpadyata ity evaṃ kuśalam, no cet saṃpadyate sāṃghikena pratisaṃstartavyāḥ; na cet śakyate
XXvinv15_u:490: yāvatāṃ śakyate tāvatāṃ saṃskāraḥ kartavyaḥ, anye vyupekṣitavyāḥ iti
XXvinv15_u:491: yadā bhagavataḥ vaistārikaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ tadā bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ; te layane nirvihanyante; bhagavān āha: dvayos trayāṇām coddeṣṭavyam antataḥ sarveṣāṃ sāmānyena niṣadanaprāmāṇikam uddeṣṭavyam
XXvinv15_u:493: sāmīcī ca parasparam upacāras tu sāmānya eva noddeṣṭavya iti uktaṃ bhagavatā; ekāny araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhapalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni (Śay-v prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata, bhikṣavaḥ, mā pramādyata, mā paścād vipratisāriṇo (A 326b) bhūta iti; āraṇyakatvasya ca bahudhā varṇo bhāṣitaḥ tadā kecid bhikṣava āraṇyakatvaṃ samādāya araṇye 'dhyavasthitāḥ; te tatra coraiḥ muṣyante; muṣitāḥ santaḥ brāhmaṇagṛhapatikulebhyaś
XXvinv15_u:494: cīvarārthaṃ paryeṣṭim āpadyamānāḥ riṃcanty uddeśaṃ pāṭham svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ manasikāram; etat prakaraṇam bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
XXvinv15_u:495: uktaṃ bhagavatā: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
XXvinv15_u:496: bhikṣava aprakāśe sthāpayanti; āraṇyako bhikṣuḥ pātracīvaraṃ sthāpayitvā dvāraṃ baddhvā tāḍakam ādāya prakrāntaḥ; anayeṣām āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām
XXvinv15_u:497: vighāto jātaḥ; bhagavān āha: prakāśe sthāne āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti; upanandasyānyatamena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kāritaḥ; sa tatra na prativasati; yo bhikṣur āgantuka āgacchati tasmai vastu dadāti lābhaṃ tv ātmanā gṛhṇāti; yāvad anyatamas traicīvariko bhikṣur āgataḥ;
XXvinv15_u:498: tenāsau vihāro dṛṣṭaḥ śūnyaḥ; sa pṛcchati, kasyāyaṃ vihāraḥ iti; bhikṣavaḥ
XXvinv15_u:499: kathayanti: upanandasya bhikṣoḥ; sa tena gatvā yācitaḥ; sa kathayati: ayaṃ
XXvinv15_u:500: vihāraḥ, prativasa; yo 'tra lābhaḥ sa mama iti; tatrāvasthitaḥ; tenāsau vihāro na kadācit saṃmṛṣṭaḥ, na sukumārī gomayakārṣī na dattā; yāvad asau tasmād vihārād apakrāntaḥ; anyo bhikṣur āgataḥ; so 'py upanandasya sakāśād yācitvā tasmin vihāre 'vasthitaḥ; paśyati taṃ vihāraṃ saṃkāraparipūrṇam;
XXvinv15_u:501: tenāsau saṃmṛṣṭaḥ saṃkāraṃ chorayitvā saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvaiva saṃkārakuṭasamīpe 'vasthitaḥ, yāvad anyatamena bhikṣuṇā dṛṣṭaḥ; sa
XXvinv15_u:502: kathayati: āyuṣman kiṃ tvaṃ saṃmārjanīvyagrahasta evāvatiṣṭhase, neyaṃ saṃmārjanī sthāpyata? iti; sa kathayati: ko 'py atra hastarakṣāsthitaḥ,
XXvinv15_u:503: tena na kadācit saṃmārjanīpadam api dattam iti; sa kathayati: amuko 'tra
XXvinv15_u:504: traicīvariko (Śay-v 37) bhikṣur avasthitaḥ iti; yāvat tenāsau piṇḍapātam
XXvinv15_u:505: aṭatā dṛṣṭa upālabdhaś ca; sa kathayati: upanando lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti ahaṃ tasya vihāraṃ śodhayāmi? iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata
XXvinv15_u:506: ārocayanti; asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: yo lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti tena vihāraḥ saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ iti uktaṃ bhagavatā: abhyatītakālagatānāṃ dānapatīnām nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādeṣṭavyā iti; saṃghasthaviro 'bhyatītakālagatānāṃ dānapatīnām arthāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate; anyatamaś ca gṛhapatir vihāram āgataḥ; tenāsau śrutaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:507: dakṣiṇām ādiśat; sa tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ kathayati: ārya yady ahaṃ
XXvinv15_u:508: vihāraṃ kārayāmi mamāpi nāmnā dakṣiṇām uddiśasi iti; sa kathayati: kāraya suṣṭv ādiśāmi iti; yāvat tena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kāritaḥ; tatrānena na kiṃcid dattaṃ; sa śūnya evāvasthitaḥ; yāvat tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ; sa vihāram āgamya kathayati: ārya madīyo vihāraḥ śūnya avasthitaḥ, na tatra kaścid bhikṣuḥ prativasati iti; saṃghasthaviraḥ kathayati: bhadramukha
XXvinv15_u:509: utsvedyaḥ; sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati: ārya ūṣare jaṃgale kāritaḥ, kathaṃ utsvedyo bhavati? gṛhapate (A 327a) nāham etat saṃdhāya kathayāmi api tu
XXvinv15_u:510: tatra lābho nāsti iti; sa kathayati: ārya idānīṃ yo madīye vihāre prativasati tam ahaṃ paṭenācchādayāmi; iti lābho labhyate iti upanandena anupūrveṇa svabhāga iva udgṛhītaḥ; so 'nyatraiva prativasati; sa śūnyas tiṣṭhati, yāvad anyatamaḥ piṇḍapātiko caityābhivandakaḥ śrāvastīm āgataḥ;
XXvinv15_u:511: tenāsau vihāraḥ śūnyo dṛṣṭaḥ; sa bhikṣūn pṛcchati; kasyāyaṃ vihāraḥ iti;
XXvinv15_u:512: taiḥ samākhyātam: sāṃghiko 'yaṃ vihāraḥ kiṃ tūpanandasya bhikṣor uddiṣṭa iti; sa upanandasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ: tavoddiṣṭo 'yaṃ vihāro 'tra
XXvinv15_u:513: tiṣṭhāmi iti; sa kathayati: evaṃ kuruṣva iti; sa tatrāvasthitaḥ; sa piṇḍapātiko dakṣo 'nalasaḥ; tenāsau pratidinam upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ kriyate;
XXvinv15_u:514: pañcānuśaṃsā saṃmarjane; ātmanaś cittaṃ prasīdati; parasya cittaṃ (Śay-v
XXvinv15_u:515: 38) prasīdati; devatā āttamanaso bhavanti; prāsādikasaṃvartanīyaṃ kuśalamūlam upacinoti; kāyasya bhedāt sugato svargaloke deveṣūpapadyata iti; ye taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ paśyanti te tasya gṛhapater gatvā
XXvinv15_u:516: ārocayanti; sa śrutvā prāmodyam utpādayati; yāvad apareṇa samayena svayam evāgataḥ paśyati tathaiva taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭam; so 'bhiprasannaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:517: tenāsau piṇḍapātikaḥ paṭenācchāditaḥ; upanandena śrutam; sa tvaritatvaritaṃ gataḥ kathayati; piṇḍapātika mamāyaṃ vihāra uddiṣṭaḥ,
XXvinv15_u:518: prayaccha me paṭakam iti; piṇḍapātika saṃlakṣayati: lābhātmako 'yaṃ yadi na dāsyāmi tathāpy ayaṃ balād grahīṣyati māṃ ca vihārān niṣkāsayiṣyati iti; tena tasya samarpitaḥ iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata
XXvinv15_u:519: ārocayanti; asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: yasya prasannaḥ prasannādhikāraṃ
XXvinv15_u:520: karoti tasyaiva sa; upanandasya tu vārṣiko lābhaḥ iti guṇapriyo lokaḥ prapīḍya prapīḍyātmānaṃ sa putradāraṃ ca; guṇavadbhyo dānam anuprayacchanti śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ; āraṇyakān bhikṣūn upanimantrya bhojayanti; āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antargṛhe bhoktuṃ gatānām adattādāyikair vihārā muṣyante; bhagavān āha: dvāraṃ baddhvā kuñcikām
XXvinv15_u:521: ādāya prakramitavyam iti; corā adattādāyikā pratikuñcikayā muṣanti;
XXvinv15_u:522: bhaganān āha: ārakṣakaṃ bhikṣuṃ sthāpayitvā gantavyam; tasya piṇḍakenāvighātaḥ kartavyaḥ iti; adattādāyikā anyaṃ bhikṣuṃ gṛhītvā
XXvinv15_u:523: gacchanti; sa kathayati: muñca dvāram iti; bhagavān āha; saṃjñā kartavyā sajvaro nirjvara iti; yadi kathayati sajvara iti na moktavyam; atha kathayati nirjvara iti moktavyam; api tv āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā ardhaśākhā upasthāpayitavyā iti; uktaṃ bhagavatā: āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā ardhaśākhā
XXvinv15_u:524: upasthāpayitavyā iti; bhikṣavo na jānīte kedṛśī ardhaśākhā iti; bhagavān
XXvinv15_u:525: āha: kukkuro bhikṣavo ardhaśākhā tasya pātraśeṣaṃ dātavyam; āraṇyakair bhikṣubhir kukkurā upasthāpitā; te stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraṃ ca nakharikābhir upalikhanti uccāraprasrāveṇa nāśayanti; bhagavān āha: kukkurapoṣakasyāhaṃ bhikṣavo (Śay-v 39) bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñāpayāmi, (A 327b)
XXvinv15_u:526: kukkurapoṣakena bhikṣuṇā kālyam evotthāya stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraś ca pratyavekṣitavyaḥ yan nakharikābhir upalikhitaṃ tat samaṃ kartavyam;
XXvinv15_u:528: āsamudācārikān dharmān asamādāya vartate, sātisāro vartate
XXvinv15_u:529: Upananda's misdemeanours āyuṣmān upanando 'nyatamasmin vihāre saṃghasthaviraḥ, yāvat tatrānyatamaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ āgataḥ; upanandaḥ saṃlakṣayati: mayā nāmeha vihāre saṃghasthavireṇa bhūtvā dvitīyasthavireṇa bhavitavyam; gacchāmy anyaṃ vihāram iti; so 'nyaṃ vihāraṃ gataḥ; tato vihārād asau gataḥ; tasmin yo dvitīyasthavirasya lābha sa saṃghasthavirasya; sa saṃlakṣayati: ihāpi me eva lābha iti; tatrāpi me sa eva lābhaḥ, kiṃ vinā prayojanena
XXvinv15_u:530: saṃghasthaviratvaṃ karomi iti; sa punas tvaritatvaritam eva vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ; ardhoddiṣṭaśayanāsane vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ; sa kathayati:
XXvinv15_u:531: yathāvṛddhikayā vihāram uddiśa iti; bhikṣavo 'tikrānta iti kṛtvā noddiśanti; upanandaḥ kathayati: āyuṣmanta kiṃ tiṣṭhata eva śāstuḥ śāsanam
XXvinv15_u:532: antardhāpayata, yathāvṛddhikayā uddiśata vihāraṃ iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha: yaḥ saṃghikena vā staupikena ḥvāḥ karaṇīyena gato bhavati tasya śayanāsanaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyam, anyatra yathāgatyā iti (Śay-v 40)
XXvinv15_u:533: upananda atilobhena dvayor vihārayor varṣā upagataḥ ubhayavaihārikaṃ lābhaṃ lapsayata iti sa vṛttāsu varṣāsu lābhaṃ prārthayate naitasmin labhyate nāpy aparasmin; śayanāsanodddeśakān bhikṣūn paribhāṣata; etat prakaraṇam bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha: varṣoṣito 'sau
XXvinv15_u:534: deyo 'sya lābhaḥ iti; bhikṣava ubhayavihārābhyām api prayacchanti;
XXvinv15_u:535: bhagavān āha: na tatrobhayavihārābhyāṃ dātavyam; ekasmāt prayacchanti;
XXvinv15_u:536: anye bhikṣavo 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivācayanti: uhayavihārayor varṣoṣitaḥ kimartham ekasamād dīyate iti; ḥetat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata
XXvinv15_u:537: ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:ḥ ubhayavihārābhyām apy ardhārdhaṃ deyam, na ca punar bhikṣuṇā dvayor vihārayor upagantavyaṃ; upagacchati, sātisāro bhavati anyatamena gṛhapatinā dvau vihārau kāritau, eka āraṇyakānāṃ, divtīyo
XXvinv15_u:538: grāmāntikānām; ācaritam tasya gṛhapter varṣoṣitasya bhikṣusaṃghasya ekaikaṃ bhikṣuṃ paṭenācchādayitum; sa paṭakān ādāya āraṇyakānāṃ vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ; upanandena śrutam; āraṇyake vihāre lābho dīyate iti; tena nandasya saṃdiṣṭam; yady atra lābho dīyate tad grahīṣyasi ity uktvā sa
XXvinv15_u:539: tvaramāṇaḥ āraṇyakaṃ vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ; tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ; sa
XXvinv15_u:540: saṃlakṣayati: yādṛśo 'sya padoddhātaḥ; gato 'yam āraṇyakaṃ vihāram, kim atra prāptakālam, ihaiva tāvat grāmāntikavihāre dadāmi; paścāt tatra dāsyāmi iti; sa pratinivartya paṭakāṃś cārayitum ārabdhaḥ; nandena hastaḥ prasāritaḥ; gṛhapatinā paṭako dattaḥ; bhūyaḥ prasārayati; gṛhapatiḥ
XXvinv15_u:541: kathayati: ārya dattas te paṭakaḥ, kiṃ bhūyaḥ prasārayasi iti; sa
XXvinv15_u:542: kathayati: (A 328a) gṛhapate upanandas tava vihāre varṣoṣitaḥ tasya
XXvinv15_u:543: santakaṃ prārthayāmi iti; gṛhaptiḥ kathayati: ḥāryaḥ svahastena bhagavata
XXvinv15_u:544: dānaṃ praśastam, svahastenaiva dāsyāmi iti; sa lajjitas tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
XXvinv15_u:545: upanandaḥ saṃlakṣayati: cirayaty asau gṛhapatiḥ, grāmāntikaṃ gamiṣyāmi iti
XXvinv15_u:546: viditvā grāmāntikavihāraṃ (Śay-v 41) gataḥ nandaṃ pṛcchati; ārya gṛhīto madīyaḥ paṭakaḥ? tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātam; gṛhapatir apy anyena pathā āraṇyakaṃ vihāram gatvā patākāṃś cārayitvā prakṛāntaḥ; ḥupanandaḥḥ punar āraṇyakaṃ vihāraṃ pradhāvitaḥ, yāvat paṭakāś cāritāḥ; sa ubhayavihārayor apy atilobhena lābhāt paribhraṣṭaḥ; sa śocati klāmyati paridevate bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvaśaṃṣayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ

XXvinv15_u:548: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvany anena atilobhāt
XXvinv15_u:550: The story of the dog vhich was too greedy (being a previous birth of
XXvinv15_u:552: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo nadyā ubhayakūle dvau vihārau, ekaḥ
XXvinv15_u:553: saṃghalābhikānām, dvitīyo piṇḍapātikānām; yāvad anyatamaḥ kukkuraḥ
